channel.title: Need help with npc dialogue

item.title: Need help with npc dialogue
item.dc:creator: @blobboy blobboy
item.description:
@blobboy wrote:

i got a problem i dont know how the dialogs are linked lets say if you have 2 options in a dialog

sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("What would you like to say?", 2460); sendFrame126("I'd like to access my bank account, please.", 2461); sendFrame126("I'd like to check my PIN settings.", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true;
lets say i click iâ€™d like to access my bank how does it know i clicked on that option and where does it open the bank ( i mean where in the source)

Read full topic
